title: World celebrates US return to Paris Accord under President Biden
lead: The UN Chief António Guterres, the Prime Minister Boris Johnson and the COP26 President were among the first to hail Biden’s move

title: Air quality restrictions eased for Los Angeles crematoriums due to Covid
lead: California’s air pollution control agency said the Covid-19 pandemic has led to a backlog in bodies waiting to be cremated

title: Energy Minister expects ‘significant progress’ on the Energy White Paper over the next two years
lead: Anne-Marie Trevelyan said she will soon publish plans how the government will decarbonise heat, buildings and industries

title: Sadiq Khan’s pandemic bike lanes ruled unlawful
lead: A Mayor of London spokesperson said they are seeking to appeal the judgement

title: New £3.7m sustainable aviation test centre planned for Orkney
lead: Different types of low carbon aircraft, including electric, hydrogen and sustainable aviation fuels, will be tested

title: Businesses in Yorkshire offered £600k for anaerobic digestion innovation
lead: Projects can include desk-based studies, consultancy, laboratory tests, scale-up or demonstration activities

title: Canada to become home of ‘one of the world’s biggest’ green hydrogen plants
lead: The water electrolysis plant will be built in Quebec and is predicted to produce 11,100 tonnes of green hydrogen annually

title: Global energy transition investment ‘hit $500bn mark in 2020’
lead: Solar and wind received the lion’s share of renewable investments globally, according to a new report

title: Biden signs executive order to rejoin Paris climate change accord
lead: The president also signed an executive order to halt the construction of the controversial Keystone XL pipeline

title: Ørsted makes final investment decision on its first renewable hydrogen project
lead: The Danish demonstration project will use offshore wind energy to produce renewable hydrogen
